summary: A small improvement to Masser, Secunda and the starry night sky.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://tesalliance.org/forums/uploads/gallery/album_264/gallery_1515_264_4023.png[/img]

12/19/2012
v1.0

Description:
------------------
This is a texture replacer pack that improves on both Masser and Secunda, as well as the basic starry sky.
All textures are double their original size, improved quality plus deeper colour saturation. Masser is more orangy while Secunda is more bluish. Stars as well are various colours.


Installation:
-----------------
Unzip into Data folder as is or install with BAIN or NMM.

Uninstall:
-------------
If manually installed, delete the Data\\Textures\\sky folder or uninstall in BAIN or NMM.


Permissions:
-----------------
Please do not upload this file anywhere else. 
Please do not re-use or re-issue without permission.
author: Hanaisse
